intro: In a magical forest, a little deer and his friends live happily... until a strange darkness arrives to change everything. A story of love, friendship, and hope.
description:
Join Finn, a brave little deer, and his friends in this beautiful visual novel!

Everything was peaceful and games with his friends... until the enormous panther Suna appears, who wants to take over the forest. Finn isn't the strongest, but with the help of his friends, the magic of the forest and his big heart, he will show that even the little ones can be great heroes.

Meet Finn's best friends.
Together they make an unforgettable team on this magical adventure!

· Bounce, the bouncy and mischievous rabbit, always ready for a race or a funny prank.

· Flora, the wise and serene skunk, who knows all the secrets of the forest.

· Nutz, the fastest squirrel in Green Hollow, curious and brave as ever.

Together they make an unforgettable team on this magical adventure!

What you'll find in this charming story:

· Magical, colorful backgrounds

· Lots of adorable and playful animals

· A beautiful story about friendship and courage

· Soft, enchanting music accompanies the adventure
